    io.smallrye.mutiny.Uni<Void>
    SessionHandler.flush(RoutingContext ctx)
    Flush a context session earlier to the store, this will allow the end user to have full control on the event of a failure at the store level.
    io.smallrye.mutiny.Uni<Void>
    SessionHandler.flush(RoutingContext ctx, boolean ignoreStatus)
    Flush a context session earlier to the store, this will allow the end user to have full control on the event of a failure at the store level.
    Void
    SessionHandler.flushAndAwait(RoutingContext ctx)
    Blocking variant of SessionHandler.flush(io.vertx.mutiny.ext.web.RoutingContext).
